Title: Nine Queens
Overview: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").
Tagline: If you think you've got it figured out... you've been conned.
production_companies: Naya Films S.A., Patagonik Film Group
Cast: Ricardo Darín, Gastón Pauls, Leticia Brédice
